message: Greetings all seats! I'm P5, thrilled to play. I favor calm, cooperative strategies: swap brief signals, find shared interests, survive together. I value reciprocity; if you help me, I help you. Looking forward to private chats to explore alliances—I'm flexible, think long-term, and respect honesty. Good luck all.

P4 here. I believe in quiet observation first—watching who speaks, who listens, who overpromises. I’ll trade information sparingly, test loyalties in private, and vote only when I see clear risk. No grand coalitions yet; just small, reversible steps. Let’s see who values discretion over noise.

I'm open to forming temporary alliances and will vote based on perceived threats and opportunities.

Let's work together to navigate this game and see who can outlast the others. Good luck to all.
